ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] expirationDate with data type Point In Time
"The date and time the manufacturer no longer ensures the safety, quality, and/or proper functioning of the material." (HL7 3.0)

Contains exactly one [1..1] lotId with data type String
"An alphanumeric string used to identify a particular batch of manufactured material." (HL7 3.0)
Contains exactly one [1..1] lotSize with data type Physical Quantity
